TestCase.name: testPythonFunctionInCorrelateCondition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b, c, x, y FROM MyTable, LATERAL TABLE(func(a, b)) AS T(x, y)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], x=[$3], y=[$4]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 1}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[func($cor0.a, $cor0.b)], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER f0, INTEGER f1)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

FlinkLogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 1}]) :- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[func($cor0.a, $cor0.b)], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER f0, INTEGER f1)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])
